entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, a boy who receives the Daily Prophet.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Harry's best friend, mentioned in the context of receiving letters from him.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Harry's other best friend, also mentioned in the context of receiving letters from her.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: The main antagonist of the story, mentioned as being back and causing concern for Harry.

entities.name: daily prophet
entities.description: A newspaper that delivers news to the wizarding world, including information about Voldemort's return.

relationships.description: Harry is concerned about Voldemort's return and its implications.
Ron and Hermione are friends with Harry, as mentioned in the context of sending him letters.
